N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 70.3 - Consent policies

State Regulations
(a) Every insurer subject to this Part may offer all applicants for medical malpractice insurance and all policyholders, effective with the next anniversary date, the option of purchasing a consent policy. (b) Any consent medical malpractice insurance policy offered an insured by the insurer shall be offered, at the insured's option, with or without a reasonable deductible or coinsurance clause. (c) The type or types of consent policies offered to insureds shall be at the option of the insurer. Notes
